title: TL v T100: Meteos in the brush
body:
Please tell me someone else saw this.

What.
The.
Fuck?

He doesn't deserve to play on the pro scene ever  again.

replies.body: can you send me the video?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GIi8-K5ahFo

Watch it from 29:13. The muppet starts to make his way to the brush.
Sits in brush for 50 years while TL do Dragon.
30:17: facepalm.
